Text.name: Text0
Text.content:
The Mercury demo content types can be accessed via the /.content/ folder.

GET /json/sites/default/mercury-demo/.content/
{
  "article-m": {},
  "contact-m": {},
  "decoy-m": {},
  "event-m": {},
  "faq-m": {},
  "flexible-m": {},
  "imageseries-m": {},
  "job-m": {},
  "layout-row-custom-m": {},
  "linksequence-m": {},
  "list-m": {},
  "map-m": {},
  "section-m": {},
  ...
}
